name: 2D Shooter Project Final (isabellanelsen03)
description:
2D Shooter Project Finished:

Modifications:

-New menu screen background.

-New player sprite with animations.

-New enemy sprites with animations.

-New royalty-free music that plays for the menu screen.

-New royalty-free music that plays during gameplay.

-New backgrounds for the levels.

-Different obstacles for each level and increasing difficulty in the number of enemies to defeat and amount spawned.

- Custom player shooting sound from GarageBand.

-Custom death sound from GarageBand.

-Custom winning game sound from GarageBand.

-Added instructions for the player.

Credits:

Isabella Nelsen
